title: PM condoles death of Sarwar Advocate
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 31 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Saturday expressed grief over the death of senior member Abbottabad District Bar and member of Pakistan Muslim League(N) Malik Muhammad Sarwar Khan Advocate.
In a condolence message, he prayed for the departed soul and for grant of patience to the bereaved family.
“In this hour of difficulty, all our sympathies are with the family of Malik Muhammad Sarwar Khan Advocate,” he added.
